column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////But having said that
column2: Brittney worked very hard to redeem our experience and made an honest
column3: heartfelt effort to apologize and make up for Bavette's one big error. Having spoken to her and seeing her effort at trying to restore our evening after the fact
column4: as best a person can do
column5: I feel compelled to honor her effort and say "Thank you". And because of her reaching out
column9: review that evening as it happened 'sans hip hop' and focus on the rest of what we experienced.
